name: Wedding Tooth Fairy Princess
description:
Have you ever imagined your wedding day with a wonderful ring and an amazing dress? I'm sure you have! Let's help our tooth fairy to get the perfect wedding every girl deserves! Design her wedding dress, her gorgeous makeup and a luxurious nail design to make her shine like a princess in her bridal gown!

But first of all... how tooth fairy can make a relaxed approach and stay calm in such an exciting life moment? Take tooth fairy to the spa to calm her down and treat her face with a facial mask! It is important to get her skin ready for the wedding makeup! Our tooth fairy thinks that there is nothing more important in a wedding preparation than the bride's makeup and dress up! Prepare both! Let's see how beautifully you design her wedding dress and how impressive shine her makeup in our bride salon and spa! Make this day unforgettable!

Remember: The devil is in the detail! A bad hairstyle, choosing a poor nails tattoo or a bad jewelry choice might ruin the bride's outfit!

- Luxury spa with multiple relaxing choices, different facial masks and accesories to prepare the bride's skin!
- Bride makeup and hairstyle salon!
- Nail design and lots of jewelry choice and perfumes to choose from!
- Multiple dress up combinations and accesories!

In this wedding preparation day you will also have the chance to take care of tooth fairy's groom! It is really important to match his suit with you dress! Let's see how romantic you are and start this wedding preparation that will end with a superb married couple! Tooth fairy is already excited! Get her ready now!
